body:
Hello,

I'm writing a Spack package to install a library. When the compiler links to the library, I'd like it to use a custom flag e.g "-xyz" rather than prepending the "-l" similar to how the Intel Math Libraries are linked with "-mkl".

I've read through the documentation and can't seem to find how to specify how other software should link against a custom library. Can someone help with this?

Thanks,
Lucas
title: Question: Custom library link flag in package creation
